name: VN Character creator
description:
A visual novel program made with Renpy
It is a dressup game that allow you to customize your character:

- pose

- skin color

- hair 

- eyes, nose, mouth 

- clothes

 - shoes

- you can take a screenshot of your character in order to use it in your enxt visual novel program

This sprite can be used in personal or commercial projects. however you can't resell the sprite on its own.

The program is still in development so new content should be published regurarly. I hope you can give me some feedback and tell me what you would like to have in it.

Feel free to ask me if you have any questions or suggestion for my next project. or you can drop by to my instagram art page:

https://www.instagram.com/studiosalzani/

You can also support me here:

 https://www.patreon.com/studiosalzani

Thank you.
